tool_description: An API showing climate change articles made by following Ania Kubow's tutorial
name: Climate-Change-News-Articles
title: Climate-Change-News-Articles

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news-articles.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news-articles.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: Retrieves all the climate change news articles from the times, guardian, and telegraph
api_list.code:
